Name: Dual Guns Fantasy
About the game: 'Dual Guns Fanstasy' is a simple and short shooting game with a arcade game style, it has a time-crisis style weapon system, the special effect of the body being hit by a bullet, and enemies from the fantasy world. A total of five levels in two modes, no need to unlock sequentially, just enjoy the pleasure of killing all enemies! This game was developed all by myself and released on steam for the first time, I will develop more games with this type of gameplay in larger scale, Hope to get support and advice, every little bit helps!
